attributes.action: Cheaper Car Insurance For Young and New Driver's
attributes.additional_details: To Lower the Cost Of Young Drivers and New Driver's Car Insurance and put a stop On insurance companys charging Young/New drivers 5 thousand pound and other ridiculous amounts by putting a maximum they can charge on to a person dependent on there skills and so forth. Test are alot harder for drivers to pass now then back in the day but yet young/New drivers get hit with the brunt of it. Cut The cost and stop The People Driving Without Insurance which Harms So Many Lives.
